title: Testing and performance optimization
description: Add unit tests for game logic, optimize WebGL rendering performance, browser compatibility testing

title: Implement collision detection system
description: Add collision detection between player bullets and enemies, enemy bullets and player, and boundaries

title: Implement responsive design and mobile support
description: Make game playable on different screen sizes, add touch controls for mobile devices

title: Add sound effects and background music
description: Implement sound effects for shooting, explosions, and animal sounds. Add retro-style background music

title: Create HTML/WebGL project boilerplate
description: Set up basic HTML structure, WebGL context initialization, and canvas setup

title: Add particle effects and visual polish
description: Implement explosion effects, muzzle flash, particle systems for visual feedback

title: Implement game states (menu, playing, game over)
description: Create start menu, pause functionality, game over screen with restart option, and level progression

title: Add scoring system and lives counter
description: Implement score tracking, display HUD with score and lives, different point values for different ruminants

title: Set up Docker containerized development environment
description: Create Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml for local development with hot-reload support

title: Create player ship and input controls
description: Implement player spaceship sprite, keyboard/touch controls for movement, and shooting mechanics

title: Design and implement ruminant enemy sprites
description: Create/source sprites for cow, sheep, goat, and alpaca enemies. Implement enemy movement patterns in grid formation like Space Invaders

title: Implement WebGL game rendering engine
description: Create sprite renderer, texture loading, basic animation system, and render loop

title: Create developer instructions for containerized environment
